<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get default auto-translation settings for project</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v2/projects/{projectId}/auto-translation-settings"}></MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

Returns default auto translation settings for project (deprecated: use per language config with null language id)

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"projectId","in":"path","required":true,"allowEmptyValue":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

OK

name={"usingTranslationMemory"} required={true} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, new keys will be automatically translated via batch operation using translation memory when 100% match is found"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"usingMachineTranslation"} required={true} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, new keys will be automatically translated via batch operationusing primary machine translation service.When \"usingTranslationMemory\" is enabled, it tries to translate it with translation memory first."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enableForImport"} required={true} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, import will trigger batch operation to translate the new new keys.\nIt includes also the data imported via CLI, Figma, or other integrations using batch key import."}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"languageId\": 0,\n  \"usingTranslationMemory\": true,\n  \"usingMachineTranslation\": true,\n  \"enableForImport\": true\n}"}
